text: @realDonaldTrump STOP MAKING THIS ABOUT DEMOCRATS AND REPUBLICANS!!!!  Covid-19 doesn’t give a flying fuck what party we like, it can and will effect everyone!!!  STOP PLAYING THE VICTIM CARD AND GROW A GOD DAMNED PAIR OF BALLS, YOU HAVE A JOB TO PROTECT, NOT DIVIDE.  NOW DO YOUR FUCKING JOB!!!!
